name: drawercli
description: This cli app supports using termuxlauncher as your primary launcher for Android phones, interactively and easily install. That's simply the Termuxlauncher Add-on built with fzfðŸš€

commands.install: mkdir -p ${PREFIX:-/usr/local}/{bin,share/man/man1} && cp drawercli.sh ${PREFIX:-/usr/local}/bin/drawercli && cp drawercli.1 ${PREFIX:-/usr/local}/share/man/man1 && echo "The installation was completed."
